Nightlight:

Nighlight hgued her daughter and opened  her comlink again "Re=
member that Hydras is treacherous and cunning, he must have think that you =
will follow Waspanator and prepared a trap in the road."

Tears started to =
fall from Nightlight's cheeks
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Richa=
rd Allen 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Thursday, February 09, 2006=
 7:34 PM
  Subject: Re: Hydras ->(Rodimus, Inferno, Waspanator)


  : : Rod=
imus Prime : :

  As Waspinator dives into the forest Rodimus comes after h=
im stopping with a screech.Rodimus travels the forest in robot mode. He tak=
es a moment to respond to his wife via the commlink.

  Rodimus: Nightlight=
, I know I dont have any cover. Just keep Elita safe. I wont go rushing int=
o the Predacon base or anything like that. Maybe I can stop Waspinator befo=
re he reaches Hydras. I'll contact you soon, love. Rodimus out.

  Rodimus =
continues to search for the Predacon bee bot.


  CatMaster o <CatMastero@y=
ahoo.com> wrote:
    "Oh oh!" Waspinator commented when he saw the maximal =
giving chase. 
    He made a turn and dived down into a forest hoping to us=
e his smaller
    size to his advantage.  He then shifted into beast mode.
=
    "Waspinator must find way to lose nasty maximal! Then Waspinator get
  =
  reward!"

wrote:

quicly and jumps to the cover of his family,

bris.

him. I'll be back. 
    > You two stay here. I love you.

tor with full thrusters!
